# .NET CLI Tools

> Using the .NET CLI to create, build, run, test, and publish applications. Core commands include `dotnet new`, `dotnet build`, `dotnet run`, `dotnet test`, and `dotnet publish`. The CLI is cross-platform and included with the .NET SDK; use `dotnet tool` to install global and local tools.

## Subtopics

- [.NET CLI Tools Extended Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/llms-extended.txt): 91 additional topics
- [BuildCheck rule list](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/llms.txt): 3 topics; BuildCheck rule list documentation and reference.
- [.NET SDK error list](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/sdk-errors/llms.txt): 32 topics; .NET SDK error list documentation and reference.
